Package cs213.photoAlbum.guiview

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountPanel
    Class is responsible for displaying all albums and related information for a specific account.
    AddPanel
    Class handles adding photos to a specific album.
    AdminPanel
    Class handles the administration page.
    AlbumView
    Class handles displaying a specific album.
    AlbumView.PlaceHolderField
    Method handles drawing a textfield with placeholder text.
    InfoPanel
    Class handles displaying information for the currently selected photo in the albumview.
    LoginPanel
    Class handles the login frame.
    MovePanel
    Class handles displaying the UI necessary to move a photo from one album to another.
    OverView
    Class is the base frame for entire project.
    PhotoButton
    Class handles all custom drawing necessary to display a photo or album as a clickable option in a larger view.
    PhotoPanel
    Class handles displaying a collection of photobuttons.
    TagPanel
    Class handles the UI to add or remove a tag from a specific photo.
    UserList
    Class works as a ListModel for the JList in the admin panel.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AlbumView.State
    Enum represents the current state of the albumview.
